房价预测¶

目录

  1. 概述
  2. 数据分析
  3. 数据前处理
  4. baseline建模及评估
  5. 模型融合及评估
  6. 预测及提交
  7. 总结

1. 概述¶

房价预测是机器学习中最经典的回归赛题,根据给定特征预测房价,最后根据RMSE排名。

2. 数据分析¶

In [1]:

import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import warnings
import matplotlib
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')
%matplotlib inline
import seaborn as sns

In [2]:

train = pd.read_csv('train.csv')
test = pd.read_csv('test.csv')
all_data = pd.concat([train,test],keys = ['train','test'],ignore_index=True)

In [3]:

all_data.head()

Out[3]:

3 961 756 0 NaN 3 1Fam Gd No 216.0 0.0 ... WD 0 Pave 7 756.0 AllPub 0 1915 1970 2006
4 1145 1053 0 NaN 4 1Fam TA Av 655.0 0.0 ... WD 0 Pave 9 1145.0 AllPub 192 2000 2000 2008

首先看一下房价的分布

In [4]:

sns.set(style="white", palette="muted")
f, axes = plt.subplots(1, 2, figsize=(10, 5))
sns.despine(left=True)
sns.distplot(train['SalePrice'], ax=axes[0]).set_title('orig', size=20)
sns.distplot(np.log(train['SalePrice']), ax=axes[1]).set_title('log', size=20)
plt.setp(axes, yticks=[])
plt.tight_layout()

原数据分布明显偏右,对数处理后呈正态分布。评分标准也是需要对预测值取对数的。

分别看一下离散特征和连续特征与目标变量的关系。

In [5]:

numeric_feats = all_data.dtypes[all_data.dtypes!="object"].index
categorical_feats = all_data.dtypes[all_data.dtypes=="object"].index

In [6]:

k = 10 #number of variables for heatmap
corrmat = train.corr()
cols = corrmat.nlargest(k, 'SalePrice')['SalePrice'].index
cm = np.corrcoef(train[cols].values.T)
f, axes = plt.subplots(figsize=(10, 5))
cmap = sns.cubehelix_palette(light=1, as_cmap=True)
hm = sns.heatmap(cm, cbar=True, annot=True, square=True, fmt='.2f', annot_kws={'size': 10}, \
                 yticklabels=cols.values, xticklabels=cols.values,cmap=cmap)

取与房价相关系数最高的9个连续属性，发现OverallQual整体质量和GrLivArea地面可居住面积的系数都比较高。

各连续特征与房价的关系:

In [7]:

numeric_feats = numeric_feats.drop("SalePrice")
def jointplot(x,y,**kwargs):
    try:
        sns.regplot(x=x,y=y)
    except Exception:
        print(x.value_counts())
f = pd.melt(train, id_vars=['SalePrice'],value_vars=numeric_feats)
g = sns.FacetGrid(f,col='variable',col_wrap=3,sharex=False,sharey=False,size=5)
g = g.map(jointplot,"value","SalePrice")

各离散特征与房价的关系:

In [8]:

train[categorical_feats] = train[categorical_feats].fillna("Missing")
def boxplot(x,y,**kwargs):
    sns.boxplot(x=x,y=y)
f = pd.melt(train,id_vars=['SalePrice'],value_vars=categorical_feats)
g = sns.FacetGrid(f,col='variable',col_wrap=3,sharex=False,sharey=False,size=5)
g = g.map(boxplot,"value","SalePrice")

缺失值的情况:

In [9]:

total = all_data.isnull().sum().sort_values(ascending=False)
percent = (all_data.isnull().sum()/all_data.isnull().count()).sort_values(ascending=False)
Type = all_data.dtypes
missing_data = pd.concat([total, percent,Type], axis=1, keys=['Total', 'Percent','Type'])
missing_data = missing_data[missing_data['Total']>0].sort_values(ascending=False,by = 'Percent')
missing_data.drop(['SalePrice'])

特征变量比较多,接近80个。可以把它们大致分为: 影响销售的一些总体因素,土地,设施及周边环境,房屋整体情况,房屋内部情况 这几个方面。在数据清洗及特征处理的过程中,边分析边处理。

3. 数据前处理¶

缺失值¶

缺失值分为两种情况: 1.缺失值表示没有该特征; 2.缺失值确实是数据缺失。 所以得视实际情况来分别处理。

  • 泳池
In [10]:

all_data.loc[(all_data['PoolQC'].isnull()) & (all_data['PoolArea']>0),['PoolQC','PoolArea']]

Out[10]:
PoolQC PoolArea
2420 NaN 368
2503 NaN 444
2599 NaN 561 
In [11]:

all_data.loc[(all_data['PoolQC'].isnull()) & (all_data['PoolArea']>0),'PoolQC']='Gd'
all_data.loc[all_data['PoolQC'].isnull(),'PoolQC']='None'
  • 车库
In [12]:

all_data.loc[(all_data['GarageFinish'].isnull())&(all_data['GarageType'].notnull()),\
             ['GarageType','GarageYrBlt','GarageFinish','GarageCars','GarageArea','GarageQual','GarageCond']]

Out[12]:
GarageType GarageYrBlt GarageFinish GarageCars GarageArea GarageQual GarageCond
2126 Detchd NaN NaN 1.0 360.0 NaN NaN
2576 Detchd NaN NaN NaN NaN NaN NaN 
In [13]:

all_data.loc[(all_data['GarageFinish'].isnull())&(all_data['GarageType'].notnull()),'GarageYrBlt'] = \
all_data.loc[(all_data['GarageFinish'].isnull())&(all_data['GarageType'].notnull()),'YearBuilt']
all_data.loc[(all_data['GarageFinish'].isnull())&(all_data['GarageType'].notnull()),'GarageQual'] = 'TA'
all_data.loc[(all_data['GarageFinish'].isnull())&(all_data['GarageType'].notnull()),'GarageCond'] = 'TA'
all_data.loc[(all_data['GarageFinish'].isnull())&(all_data['GarageType'].notnull()),'GarageFinish'] = 'Unf'
all_data['GarageCars'].fillna(2,inplace = True)
all_data['GarageArea'].fillna(all_data[all_data['GarageArea']>0].GarageArea.mean(),inplace = True)
all_data['GarageCond'].fillna('None',inplace = True)
all_data['GarageType'].fillna('None',inplace = True)
all_data['GarageQual'].fillna('None',inplace = True)
all_data['GarageFinish'].fillna('None',inplace = True)
all_data['GarageYrBlt'].fillna(0,inplace = True)
  • 地下室
In [14]:

all_data.loc[(all_data['TotalBsmtSF'].isnull()),\
              ['BsmtQual','BsmtCond','BsmtExposure','BsmtFinType1',\
                                            'BsmtFinSF1','BsmtFinType2','BsmtFinSF2','BsmtUnfSF','TotalBsmtSF']]

all_data['TotalBsmtSF'].fillna(0,inplace = True)

In [28]:

all_data.loc[(all_data['MasVnrType'].isnull())&(all_data['MasVnrArea'].notnull()),'MasVnrType'] = 'BrkFace'

In [29]:

freq_port = all_data.MSZoning.dropna().mode()[0]
all_data['MSZoning'].fillna(freq_port,inplace = True)
freq_port = all_data.SaleType.dropna().mode()[0]
all_data['SaleType'].fillna(freq_port,inplace = True)
freq_port = all_data.Functional.dropna().mode()[0]
all_data['Functional'].fillna(freq_port,inplace = True)
freq_port = all_data.Electrical.dropna().mode()[0]
all_data['Electrical'].fillna(freq_port,inplace = True)
freq_port = all_data.KitchenQual.dropna().mode()[0]
all_data['KitchenQual'].fillna(freq_port,inplace = True)
freq_port = all_data.KitchenQual.dropna().mode()[0]
all_data['Exterior1st'].fillna(freq_port,inplace = True)
freq_port = all_data.KitchenQual.dropna().mode()[0]
all_data['Exterior2nd'].fillna(freq_port,inplace = True)

all_data.drop(['Utilities'],axis = 1,inplace = True)
all_data['CentralAir'] = all_data['CentralAir'].map(
    {'N': 0, 'Y': 1}).astype(int)

all_data['MiscFeature'].fillna('None',inplace = True)
all_data['Alley'].fillna('None',inplace = True)
all_data['Fence'].fillna('None',inplace = True)
all_data['FireplaceQu'].fillna('None',inplace = True)
all_data['LotFrontage'].fillna(all_data['LotFrontage'].mean(),inplace = True)
all_data['MasVnrType'].fillna('None',inplace = True)
all_data['MasVnrArea'].fillna(0,inplace = True)
all_data['BsmtFullBath'].fillna(0,inplace = True)
all_data['BsmtHalfBath'].fillna(0,inplace = True)
all_data['MasVnrType'].fillna('None',inplace = True)

最后检查一下缺失情况

In [30]:

total = all_data.isnull().sum().sort_values(ascending=False)
percent = (all_data.isnull().sum()/all_data.isnull().count()).sort_values(ascending=False)
Type = all_data.dtypes
missing_data = pd.concat([total, percent,Type], axis=1, keys=['Total', 'Percent','Type'])
missing_data = missing_data[missing_data['Total']>0].sort_values(ascending=False,by = 'Percent')
missing_data.drop(['SalePrice'])

Out[30]:
Total Percent Type

特征工程¶

一些离散变量,其含义是带有序列关系的,对于这类特征可以按需赋予连续值,这样也对后期的回归模型有利。

In [31]:

qual_dict = {'None': 0, 'Po': 1, 'Fa': 2, 'TA': 3, 'Gd': 4, 'Ex': 5}
all_data['ExterQual'] = all_data['ExterQual'].map(qual_dict).astype(int)
all_data['ExterCond'] = all_data['ExterCond'].map(qual_dict).astype(int)
all_data['BsmtQual'] = all_data['BsmtQual'].map(qual_dict).astype(int)
all_data['BsmtCond'] = all_data['BsmtCond'].map(qual_dict).astype(int)
all_data['HeatingQC'] = all_data['HeatingQC'].map(qual_dict).astype(int)
all_data['KitchenQual'] = all_data['KitchenQual'].map(qual_dict).astype(int)
all_data['FireplaceQu'] = all_data['FireplaceQu'].map(qual_dict).astype(int)
all_data['GarageQual'] = all_data['GarageQual'].map(qual_dict).astype(int)
all_data['GarageCond'] = all_data['GarageCond'].map(qual_dict).astype(int)

all_data['BsmtExposure'] = all_data['BsmtExposure'].map(
    {'None': 0, 'No': 1, 'Mn': 2, 'Av': 3, 'Gd': 4}).astype(int)

all_data['Functional'] = all_data['Functional'].map(
    {'None': 0, 'Sal': 1, 'Sev': 2, 'Maj2': 3, 'Maj1': 4,
     'Mod': 5, 'Min2': 6, 'Min1': 7, 'Typ': 8}).astype(int)

all_data['GarageFinish'] = all_data['GarageFinish'].map(
    {'None': 0, 'Unf': 1, 'RFn': 2, 'Fin': 3}).astype(int)

all_data['Fence'] = all_data['Fence'].map(
    {'None': 0, 'MnWw': 1, 'GdWo': 2, 'MnPrv': 3, 'GdPrv': 4}).astype(int)

all_data['PoolQC'] = all_data['PoolQC'].map(qual_dict).astype(int)

针对地下室的情况,部分样本含有多种评价情况。因此考虑将其整合为一个变量，并为每种情况打分,最后合并为一个总分值。

In [32]:

df1=all_data[['Id','BsmtFinType1','BsmtFinSF1']]
df1.columns=['Id','BsmtFinType','BsmtFinSF']
df2=all_data[['Id','BsmtFinType2','BsmtFinSF2']]
df2.columns=['Id','BsmtFinType','BsmtFinSF']
df=df1.append(df2, ignore_index=True)
df=df.groupby(['Id','BsmtFinType'],as_index=False).sum()
df=df.pivot(index='Id', columns='BsmtFinType', values='BsmtFinSF').drop(['None','Unf'],axis = 1)

df=pd.DataFrame(df.values,columns=['BsmtFinType_ALQ','BsmtFinType_BLQ','BsmtFinType_GLQ','BsmtFinType_LwQ','BsmtFinType_Rec'])

df.fillna(0,inplace = True)

df=pd.concat([df,all_data['TotalBsmtSF']],axis = 1)

df['BsmtFinType_Unf']=df['TotalBsmtSF']-df['BsmtFinType_ALQ']-\
df['BsmtFinType_BLQ']-df['BsmtFinType_GLQ']-df['BsmtFinType_LwQ']-df['BsmtFinType_Rec']
df['BsmtFinScore']=df['BsmtFinType_Unf']*1+df['BsmtFinType_LwQ']*2+df['BsmtFinType_Rec']*3+\
df['BsmtFinType_BLQ']*4+df['BsmtFinType_ALQ']*5+df['BsmtFinType_GLQ']*6

#df['BsmtFinType_ALQ']=df['BsmtFinType_ALQ']/df['TotalBsmtSF']
#df['BsmtFinType_BLQ']=df['BsmtFinType_BLQ']/df['TotalBsmtSF']
#df['BsmtFinType_GLQ']=df['BsmtFinType_GLQ']/df['TotalBsmtSF']
#df['BsmtFinType_LwQ']=df['BsmtFinType_LwQ']/df['TotalBsmtSF']
#df['BsmtFinType_Rec']=df['BsmtFinType_Rec']/df['TotalBsmtSF']
#df['BsmtFinType_Unf']=df['BsmtFinType_Unf']/df['TotalBsmtSF']
#df.fillna(0,inplace = True)

all_data.drop(['BsmtFinType1','BsmtFinSF1','BsmtFinType2','BsmtFinSF2','BsmtUnfSF'],axis=1,inplace = True)

all_data = pd.concat([all_data,df['BsmtFinScore']],axis=1)

合并Condition

In [33]:

df=pd.get_dummies(all_data[['Condition1','Condition2']])
df['Condition_Artery']=df['Condition1_Artery']+df['Condition2_Artery']
df['Condition_Feedr']=df['Condition1_Feedr']+df['Condition2_Feedr']
df['Condition_Norm']=df['Condition1_Norm']+df['Condition2_Norm']
df['Condition_PosA']=df['Condition1_PosA']+df['Condition2_PosA']
df['Condition_PosN']=df['Condition1_PosN']+df['Condition2_PosN']
df['Condition_RRAe']=df['Condition1_RRAe']+df['Condition2_RRAe']
df['Condition_RRAn']=df['Condition1_RRAn']+df['Condition2_RRAn']
df['Condition_RRNe']=df['Condition1_RRNe']
df['Condition_RRNn']=df['Condition1_RRNn']+df['Condition2_RRNn']

df=df[['Condition_Artery','Condition_Feedr','Condition_Norm','Condition_PosA','Condition_PosN',\
      'Condition_RRAe','Condition_RRAn','Condition_RRNe','Condition_RRNn']]

df[df>0]=1

all_data.drop(['Condition1','Condition2'],axis=1,inplace = True)
all_data = pd.concat([all_data,df],axis=1)

合并Exterior

In [34]:

df=pd.get_dummies(all_data[['Exterior1st','Exterior2nd']])
df['Exterior_AsbShng']=df['Exterior1st_AsbShng']+df['Exterior2nd_AsbShng']
df['Exterior_AsphShn']=df['Exterior1st_AsphShn']+df['Exterior2nd_AsphShn']
df['Exterior_BrkComm']=df['Exterior1st_BrkComm']+df['Exterior2nd_Brk Cmn']
df['Exterior_BrkFace']=df['Exterior1st_BrkFace']+df['Exterior2nd_BrkFace']
df['Exterior_CBlock']=df['Exterior1st_CBlock']+df['Exterior2nd_CBlock']
df['Exterior_CemntBd']=df['Exterior1st_CemntBd']+df['Exterior2nd_CmentBd']
df['Exterior_HdBoard']=df['Exterior1st_HdBoard']+df['Exterior2nd_HdBoard']
df['Exterior_ImStucc']=df['Exterior1st_ImStucc']+df['Exterior2nd_ImStucc']
df['Exterior_MetalSd']=df['Exterior1st_MetalSd']+df['Exterior2nd_MetalSd']
df['Exterior_Other']=df['Exterior2nd_Other']
df['Exterior_Plywood']=df['Exterior1st_Plywood']+df['Exterior2nd_Plywood']
df['Exterior_Stone']=df['Exterior1st_Stone']+df['Exterior2nd_Stone']
df['Exterior_Stucco']=df['Exterior1st_Stucco']+df['Exterior2nd_Stucco']
df['Exterior_TA']=df['Exterior1st_TA']+df['Exterior2nd_TA']
df['Exterior_VinylSd']=df['Exterior1st_VinylSd']+df['Exterior2nd_VinylSd']
df['Exterior_Wd Sdng']=df['Exterior1st_Wd Sdng']+df['Exterior2nd_Wd Sdng']
df['Exterior_WdShing']=df['Exterior1st_WdShing']+df['Exterior2nd_Wd Shng']

df=df[['Exterior_AsbShng','Exterior_AsphShn','Exterior_BrkComm','Exterior_BrkFace',\
       'Exterior_CBlock','Exterior_CemntBd','Exterior_HdBoard','Exterior_ImStucc',\
       'Exterior_MetalSd','Exterior_Other','Exterior_Plywood','Exterior_Stone',\
       'Exterior_Stucco','Exterior_TA','Exterior_VinylSd','Exterior_Wd Sdng','Exterior_WdShing']]

df[df>0]=1
all_data.drop(['Exterior1st','Exterior2nd'],axis=1,inplace = True)
all_data = pd.concat([all_data,df],axis=1)

对年份相关的数据,统一转换成距离销售年的年数

In [35]:

all_data['YearBuilt']=all_data['YrSold']-all_data['YearBuilt']
all_data.loc[all_data['YearBuilt']<0,'YearBuilt']=0
all_data['YearRemodAdd']=all_data['YrSold']-all_data['YearRemodAdd']
all_data.loc[all_data['YearRemodAdd']<0,'YearRemodAdd']=0
all_data['GarageYrBlt']=all_data['YrSold']-all_data['GarageYrBlt']
all_data.loc[all_data['GarageYrBlt']>2000,'GarageYrBlt']=0
all_data.loc[all_data['GarageYrBlt']<0,'GarageYrBlt']=0

将销售年月等转换成类别

对右偏连续特征做对数处理

In [39]:

numeric_feats = all_data.drop(['SalePrice'],axis = 1).dtypes[all_data.dtypes!="object"].index

from scipy import stats
skewed_feats = all_data[numeric_feats].apply(lambda x: stats.skew(x.dropna())) #compute skewness
cnt_feats=all_data[numeric_feats].apply(lambda x: len(pd.unique(x.dropna())))
max_feats=all_data[numeric_feats].apply(lambda x:max(x.dropna()))
df = pd.concat([skewed_feats,cnt_feats,max_feats],axis=1)
df.columns = ['skew','cnt','max']
#df.drop(['SalePrice'],inplace = True)
skewed_feats = df.loc[(abs(df['skew'])>0.5)&(df['max']>1)&(df['cnt']>30)].index

all_data[skewed_feats] = np.log1p(all_data[skewed_feats])
all_data['SalePrice'] = np.log(all_data['SalePrice'])

对离散变量二值化处理

In [40]:

all_data = pd.get_dummies(all_data)

划分训练集和测试集,并对所有数据进行[0,1]标准化

In [41]:

y_train = pd.Series(list(all_data.loc[:train.shape[0]-1,'SalePrice']))
y_train.name='SalePrice'
all_data.drop(['SalePrice'],axis = 1,inplace = True)

本赛题数据清洗以及特征工程的工作量很大,很多特征工程还需要基于对美国房市的了解。

4. baseline建模及评估¶

In [42]:

mean_rmse = {}
mean_time = {}

In [43]:

from sklearn.model_selection import learning_curve
def plot_learning_curve(estimator, title, X, y, ylim=None, cv=None,
                        n_jobs=1, train_sizes=np.linspace(.1, 1.0, 5)):
    plt.figure()
    plt.title(title)
    if ylim is not None:
        plt.ylim(*ylim)
    plt.xlabel("Training examples")
    plt.ylabel("Score")
    train_sizes, train_scores, test_scores = learning_curve(
        estimator, X, y, cv=cv, n_jobs=n_jobs, train_sizes=train_sizes, scoring='neg_mean_squared_error')
    train_scores = np.sqrt(abs(train_scores))
    test_scores = np.sqrt(abs(test_scores))
    train_scores_mean = np.mean(train_scores, axis=1)
    train_scores_std = np.std(train_scores, axis=1)
    test_scores_mean = np.mean(test_scores, axis=1)
    test_scores_std = np.std(test_scores, axis=1)

    plt.grid(True)

    plt.fill_between(train_sizes, train_scores_mean - train_scores_std,
                     train_scores_mean + train_scores_std, alpha=0.01,
                     color="r")
    plt.fill_between(train_sizes, test_scores_mean - test_scores_std,
                     test_scores_mean + test_scores_std, alpha=0.01, color="g")
    plt.plot(train_sizes, train_scores_mean, 'o-', color="r",
             label="Training score")
    plt.plot(train_sizes, test_scores_mean, 'o-', color="g",
             label="Cross-validation score")

    plt.legend(loc="best")
    return plt

In [44]:

from sklearn.model_selection import KFold
from sklearn.metrics import mean_squared_error
import time
def kfold_plot(train, ytrain, model):
    kf = KFold(n_splits=5)
    rmse_scores = []
    exe_time = []

    i=0
    for train_index, test_index in kf.split(train, ytrain):
        X_train, X_test = train.iloc[train_index], train.iloc[test_index]
        y_train, y_test = ytrain.iloc[train_index], ytrain.iloc[test_index]
        begin_t = time.time()
        model.fit(X_train, y_train)
        predictions = model.predict(X_test)
        end_t = time.time()
        exe_time.append(round(end_t-begin_t, 3))

        rmse_scores.append(np.sqrt(mean_squared_error(y_test.astype(float), predictions)))

        i += 1

    print ('mean rmse_scores: ', np.mean(rmse_scores))
    print ('mean model process time: ', np.mean(exe_time), 's')
    plot_learning_curve(model, "Learning Curves",train, ytrain,ylim=(0.01, 0.2),  n_jobs=1,cv=5)
    plt.show()
    return np.mean(rmse_scores),np.mean(exe_time)

In [45]:

from sklearn.linear_model import Ridge,Lasso,LinearRegression
ridge_model = Ridge()
mean_rmse['ridge'],mean_time['ridge'] = kfold_plot(x_train, y_train, ridge_model)

mean rmse_scores:  0.117558639757
mean model process time:  0.0106 s

In [46]:

lasso_model = Lasso(alpha=0.001)
mean_rmse['lasso'],mean_time['lasso'] = kfold_plot(x_train, y_train, lasso_model)

mean rmse_scores:  0.117304796839
mean model process time:  0.0234 s

In [47]:

x_train.shape[1]

Out[47]:

233

使用Ridge和Lasso都有过拟合的现象,Lasso因为带有特征选择,所以比Ridge稍好一些。考虑到一共有233个特征,对特征做一定的筛选。

In [48]:

d={'coef':abs(Lasso(alpha=0.001).fit(x_train,y_train).coef_),\
    'feature':x_train.columns.values
}
df=pd.DataFrame(data=d,columns = ['feature','coef']).sort_values(by='coef',ascending=False)
fs_l1=list(df.iloc[:30].feature)#取前50个特征

模型效果对比¶

In [58]:

df_eval={"model" : list(mean_rmse.keys()),
                  "rmse" : list(mean_rmse.values())}
df_eval=pd.DataFrame(df_eval,columns=["model","rmse"])
df_eval.sort_values("rmse",ascending=True)

Out[58]:
model rmse
2 svm 0.112001
0 ridge 0.113015
1 lasso 0.113073
3 linearsvm 0.114572
4 LGB 0.118972
5 RF 0.172999

感觉对于回归问题,似乎一些基于距离计算的算法会更好用一些。用树做回归还得继续研究。

5. 模型融合及评估¶

In [59]:

from mlxtend.regressor import StackingRegressor
from sklearn.model_selection import cross_val_score

srgs_model = StackingRegressor(regressors=[lasso_model, ridge_model,linearsvm_model, svm_model],\
                               meta_regressor=LinearRegression()
                              )
mean_rmse['stack'],mean_time['stack'] = kfold_plot(x_train[fs_l1], y_train, srgs_model)

mean rmse_scores:  0.111810666508
mean model process time:  0.121 s

6. 预测及提交¶

In [60]:

srgs_model.fit(x_train[fs_l1], y_train)
y = srgs_model.predict(x_test[fs_l1])
y=np.exp(y)
obj = pd.Series(y,name = 'SalePrice')
result = pd.concat([test['Id'],obj],axis=1)
result.to_csv('result_stack.csv',index = False)

提交后在Leaderboard上分数0.12842,看来模型有一定的过拟合

7. 总结¶

  1. 本赛题的重点其实是在特征工程上,一些类别特征如MSSubClass,美国房市的淡旺季等等,有相关行业背景知识,其实可以提炼出更多的连续属性,对回归更有利,本次最后的提交分数不高,主要也是此原因;
  2. 树模型做回归问题仍然值得更进一步学习。
